name: Gallery Widget
description: - Make your home screen phone even more beautiful and more interesting  - A choice of four types of widgets on the home screen to show the 3,4, 5 and 6 or one larger preview last stored pictures and videos with date display options, after clicking to open them in the default application  - Display random image from selected folders in custom interval  - Basic version allows you to open only the first preview  - In the new version, you can have different settings for each widget, so you can create holiday photo albums directly on your home screen
